full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,KHYUNG NAG SH'AKYA KA RAS MDZAD PA'I GSHIN RTZIS SPYI'I DON BCU GSUM GSAL BAR BYED PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015B (CES PHUGS LUGS RTZIS KYI LEGS BSHAD MKHAS PA'I MGUL RGYAN DO SHAL DPYOD LDAN SNYING NOR LAS, GSHIN RTZIS CUNG ZAD SPROS PA 'DI NI NYAM PHRA ZHING, LHUN PO DON GRUB DBANG RGYAL GYI NAG DKAR RTZIS BYINGS SNYIGS MA'I DUS SU 'GRAM PA'I ZLA BRAL LTA BU YIG CHA DANG GONG MA RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I GSHIN RTZIS KYI YIG CHA MANG PO NANG NAS, PHYUNG NAG SH'AKYA KA RAS MDZAD PA'I GSHIN RTZIS 'DI NI HA CAN DGOS PA YIN 'DUG KYANG, GZHAN YANG PAn CHEN SMON 'GRO BA'I DPE CHA RGYUN DUS, 'CHI MED BDE BA'I GSHIN RTZIS SKOR DANG BSTUN LA RANG NYID KYI RIGS PAS DPYAD DE, THANG TSIG GI BCOS THABS SOGS BSDUS SHING DON TSANG BAS 'TSOL BA DANG, DUR BTAB LAS GZHAN NI TSOGS PAR BGYIS PA'I 'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYIS 'CHI BA MED PA'I TSE YI RIG 'DZIN THOB PA DANG, @016A *, ,RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE NI PHYOGS DUS GNAS SKABS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , MANGGA LAm, ,)
